blog.name: far-eviler
blog.title: Val Freire is FAR-EVILER
blog.description: Builder of Worlds. Mixer of Drinks. Teller of Tales. Breaker of Limbs. Wielder of Colors. Maker of Runes. Fixer of Stuffs. Thanks for asking and you? ٩(^ᴗ^)۶

summary: hey! i’m a super huge fan of “the mortal instruments” series and one of the things that got me super hooked was your rune...
question: hey! i’m a super huge fan of “the mortal instruments” series and one of the things that got me super hooked was your rune designs in “the shadow hunters codex”. i was hoping to get one of the rune designs tattooed later this year (courage in combat to be precise) and i wanted to know if i can go through with it and if yes, how to go about doing it. i would kill to get your permission for something like this that means so much to me! <3
answer:
Hey, I’m a huge fan of you (always good to hear from Anon)! I’m flattered as eff that my runes got you hooked on Shadowhunters. Hate to break it to you but I don’t think there’s a remedy for that. Since early days @cassandraclare​ & my s’elf made it a focused effort to create solid visual for the TMI world. Her incredible trust and generosity left me enough room to not just smash together a bunch of pretty nonsensical swirls but to make a tangible language that millions have responded to. As a tattooist, I felt responsible to make sure gibberish never went on peoples’ bodies, since then I’ve been blessed to hear shared stories with countless others on what these precious and precise things mean to them. It was not easy work on the first few, creating and learning along the way but it was worth every anxious step and tireless night.

Years later, creating newer ones came easier, were more fun and meant more with each set. “Courage in Combat” means the most to me. It’s a weird thing to have something so private also so public and it’s the one I’m proudest of when I see shared. So, it kill you… just to honor me with being part of your story? uhh…

I will never say no to this question !!! meaning I’ll always say yes to this question!!

Firstly; Altho I’m certain you do Anon, as a piece of advice for any reading and because I know there are wrong versions floating around (Pinterest/Google Image Search) make sure the image you want to get tattooed…

…is the rune you would want to get Tattooed. Double and triple check that. Or even run it past a friend. OR check with an expert!✌

  • Mortal Instruments Set
  • Infernal Devices Set
  • 7 Types of Love Set
  • Shadowhunters Rune Set 1
  • Shadowhunters Rune Set 2
  • Shadowhunters Rune Set 3
  • Shadowhunters Rune Set 4
  • Shadowhunters Rune Set 5
  • Dark Artifices Set 1
  • Dark Artifices Set 2
  • Dark Artifices Set 3
  • Dark Artifices Set 4
  • 9 Shields of Element

(as long as people aren’t trying to make a buck off my work, I’m happy as a kitty on cracknip to say share it)

And Then: 1) I suggestion you find a decent shop. 2) Ask if you can look through the portfolio book of some of the artists there. I prefer to do this in person instead of on-line because I’d like to see if I get along with the person. If you click with the artist, book some time and settle in to make a connection of a lifetime.

True Fact; getting a tattoo (especially your first) can be a really intimate experience. A really big part of my job in the first few months of working in my friends’ shop was just hand holding. Putting clients at ease came first and then taking designs requests. It was the best, well the start of the best work experience of my life.

Also; The other suggestion I have is ask friends who’ve got tats. Maybe they have a recommendations for you. Chances are if they’ve got good or bad experiences and they’ll talk to you about it, at length.

Lastly;  give it time. Best advice I ever got was from the guy who apprenticed me. Pick a piece, hold onto it for 6 months or 6 weeks even. If you still feel like you love this piece as much as you did on day one than it’s meant to live on your body. Its simple advice but if I hadn’t listened I’d be covered head-to-toe in awful 90′s-00′s band-motifs and cover-ups of cover-ups of band motifs. But to speak in plain cliche’s “Tattoos are Addicting” but “Your Body is a Temple.”

There were times I spent crying tears of fury in the autoclave room because I couldn’t deal with how horrible some stories were or sad pieces were we had been paid to cover-up. To this day, I’m still terribly adamant on preventing bad tattoos, bad tattooists and dedicated to promoting the good stuffs! Even now, Tattoo Fixers on E4 is one of my go-to shows when I need comfort, it’s hella nostalgic for me… in a bittersweet way.

There is a list of reasons why @cassandraclare​ & I work well together, but if I had to guess why it works best… it would be because when the opportunity comes we jump at the chance. For me, I can’t stand the idea someone might step into this role who’d care for the people & culture one iota less than would be worthy. Those wrapped up and entrusting themselves to the Shadowhunter world deserve the best or at least our best effort.

All the stories are true… or have truth in them to be sure and this short, red-head with a bad temper would kick anyone’s ass who’d poorly mark/mutilate a fan for the sake of enfranchisement, profit or just for the s‘cause. However y’all come along, you’re Beautificus as you are and if it’d make you contented to get marked up I’d be happy to have y’all marked up… and I’d be happy to fuck up anyone who cock that up leftwise!

Anyone and everyone who wants to get runes tatted on them DO EET!! Take photos, share it, tag me or just send it via e-mail, I’d lurv to see it!

Maybe you can tell but I love talking about tattooing. It’s a thing. Have an awesome, AWESOME experience! You’ve got my blessing and brightest thoughts, Anon… all the Anons 💞

summary: Ello all, I’m opening up proper commissions now! Hit me up if you’re interested. Things I will do:  Original Characters  Fan...
caption:
Ello all, I’m opening up proper commissions now! Hit me up if you’re interested.

Things I will do:

  • Original Characters
  • Fan characters
  • Animals

Some things I won’t do:

  • NSFW
  • Mechs
  • Gore
  • More than two characters (Except for pixels if they’re going to be linked)
  • Fetish
  • No buff characters
  • Humans (I’m not confident enough that I would do them justice)

I can show wips by request!

blog.name: gachapuns
blog.title: I Feel God In This Neoboard Tonight
blog.description:
